se.jguru.nazgul.core.jmx.api.event

Class DefaultNotificationEmitter

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.management.NotificationBroadcasterSupport
      • se.jguru.nazgul.core.jmx.api.event.DefaultNotificationEmitter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, NotificationBroadcaster, NotificationEmitter

    public class DefaultNotificationEmitter
extends NotificationBroadcasterSupport
implements Serializable
    Abstract NotificationEmitter implementation, sporting functionality for adding and removing listeners.
    Author:
    Lennart Jörelid, jGuru Europe AB
    See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • DefaultNotificationEmitter

        public DefaultNotificationEmitter(String id,
                                  MBeanNotificationInfo... info)

        Constructs a NotificationBroadcasterSupport with information about the notifications that may be sent. Each listener is invoked by the thread sending the notification. This constructor is equivalent to NotificationBroadcasterSupport.NotificationBroadcasterSupport(java.util.concurrent.Executor, javax.management.MBeanNotificationInfo[] info).

        If the info array is not empty, then it is cloned by the constructor as if by info.clone(), and each call to NotificationBroadcasterSupport.getNotificationInfo() returns a new clone.

        Parameters:
        id - a (unique) id of this DefaultNotificationEmitter.
        info - an array indicating, for each notification this MBean may send, the name of the Java class of the notification and the notification type. Can be null, which is equivalent to an empty array.

      • DefaultNotificationEmitter

        public DefaultNotificationEmitter(String id,
                                  Executor executor,
                                  MBeanNotificationInfo... info)

        Constructs a NotificationBroadcasterSupport with information about the notifications that may be sent, and where each listener is invoked using the given Executor.

        When sendNotification is called, a listener is selected if it was added with a null NotificationFilter, or if NotificationFilter.isNotificationEnabled(Notification) returns true for the notification being sent. The call to NotificationFilter.isNotificationEnabled takes place in the thread that called sendNotification. Then, for each selected listener, executor.execute is called with a command that calls the handleNotification method.

        If the info array is not empty, then it is cloned by the constructor as if by info.clone(), and each call to NotificationBroadcasterSupport.getNotificationInfo() returns a new clone.

        Parameters:
        id - a (unique) id of this DefaultNotificationEmitter.
        executor - an executor used by the method sendNotification to send each notification. If it is null, the thread calling sendNotification will invoke the handleNotification method itself.
        info - an array indicating, for each notification this MBean may send, the name of the Java class of the notification and the notification type. Can be null, which is equivalent to an empty array.

    • Method Detail

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
        Returns:

      • getDefaultStateChangeNotificationEmitter

        public static DefaultNotificationEmitter getDefaultStateChangeNotificationEmitter(String id)
        Factory method to generate a StateChange DefaultNotificationEmitter instance with the supplied id.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the returned DefaultNotificationEmitter. Cannot be null or empty.
        Returns:
        a StateChange DefaultNotificationEmitter instance which emits events for AttributeChangeNotification.ATTRIBUTE_CHANGE with the attribute name state.
